blog.name: thestarkpack
blog.title: The North Remembers
blog.description: An online quiz said i'd be a Stark

summary: that Winterfell plotline in s7 kinda bothered me, i feel like the point of the plotline should’ve been like “they haven’t seen...
body:
that Winterfell plotline in s7 kinda bothered me, i feel like the point of the plotline should’ve been like “they haven’t seen each other for years, can their familial bonds be severed or will they be able to overcome manipulation and become closer than ever” instead of where the actual focus of the plotline ended up being

i feel like that would’ve embodied the Stark’s values of honor and family, like “will those values prevail? or have they been lost after years of separation”

tags: How will the WW be defeated
summary: Dany and her summer army and dragons won't be the savior of the north.  Bran will be the savior of the north.  The person who...
question: Dany and her summer army and dragons won't be the savior of the north.  Bran will be the savior of the north.  The person who lost the use of his legs, who was chosen by Bloodraven, who Jojen, Meera, Hodor, Benjen, Summer, Maester Luwin and Cat helped is the person who will be instrumental to defeating the Night King.  Dany is not a savior.  She thinks she is a savior.  The crippled boy who wanted to be a knight will be the savior the North needs.
answer:
Dear nonny,

there has been some hints that the dragons might not be that useful after all - White Walkers and Night King being immune to fire and all that.

And I agree that Bran will have a very important role, and I think as a person who will be dependent on others for his whole life he is actually a perfect “wizard”, because it seems to me that the temptation to hubris would be less.

I always call Da€nerys the accidental saviour: She wants an army and accidentally frees slaves e.g. She likes to be hailed as a saviour though. I think to be an actual saviour she would have to want to do that and I don’t see that.

And Bran would be a good saviour - in my fic he always has some key knowledge that will help, and I think there is a good chance that we will also see Bran being very important in the show. Not because they really built up Bran as an important figure, but rather because I think that Bran is essential to the endgame and the endgame should be close to what GRRM had in mind.

As for Bloodraven choosing Bran: This might not be a good thing. @lady-in-a-song and @lostlittlesatellites and me had some chats about Bloodraven and he might have his own sinister plans. It is hinted at in the books, that he first wanted to recruit Euron and only fell on Bran as a last resort and because Bran was approachable when he was in a coma after his fall. I do think bookwise Bran will have to seperate himself from Bloodraven whose agenda might even be to gain immortality or prolonging of life by warging into Jon. This is not yet a full theory but rather a hunch. Bloodraven in the books makes me uncomfortable and he seems to be a magic-user who uses people for his own purposes, and that is also the characteristic of a tyrant…. I don’t trust him, not at all.

Apart from that, Bran has come a long way, and I am sure, that he will choose the right side, the sight of the living, and if he has to warg into a White Walker or the Night King I think there will be a good reason behind that. I’m not particularly fond of any of these ideas, but I must admit that I have not yet developped a full fledged theory on Bran’s endgame. My headcanon is that he wargs into the dragons, flys them to all the places of magic of the CotF, destroys the magic of the children, which makes the WW drop down and then ensures that the dragons are dead as well. But that is not really a theory, it is an outcome I would like (which is not the same as a theory, as many people in this fandom seem to forget!)

Thanks for the ask!

tags: a post of ice and fire
summary: I watched the promo with Maisie, Sophie and Kit and I thought of an alternative reality where the Stark kids make a promo video...
body:
I watched the promo with Maisie, Sophie and Kit and I thought of an alternative reality where the Stark kids make a promo video for their House.

On that video, Maisie and Sophie include themselves as to what game of thrones has to offer. But it’s Sophie who also mentions Kit, instead of doing it himself. And I can imagine either of Stark sisters (or even better both) to be the ones to include Jon as to what House Stark has to offer (because Jon is too humble and insecure to associate himself with the Stark name).

Bonus, in the House Stark video Bran also participates and since he knows the future of each Stark sibling he mentions towards the end of this promo and then the rest of his siblings look at him with a “wtf” face because he spoiled the future in front of everyone.

tags: I have feelings for the youngest stark pov
summary: Friendly reminder that Bran is only a seven years old boy at the beginning of the asoaf books. He’s so small that he can’t even...
body:
Friendly reminder that Bran is only a seven years old boy at the beginning of the asoaf books. He’s so small that he can’t even ride a horse and instead he rides a pony.

A little sweet boy that didn’t deserve anything that happened to him :/

blog.name: stray-arrows
blog.title: ☾ KING IN THE NORTH ☆
blog.description:
iss your ~problematic~ fave |  JON SNOW | CLERITH | CLOUD STRIFE | 
 JONERYS | 
MATT MURDOCK | SPACE |  karedevil | kastle | mattelektra | ben poindexter | RICK GRIMES | richonne | CARYL | ichiruki | sasusaku | GAME OF THRONES | aliens | synthwave | the walking dead (1-6) ♥

summary: When winter comes for war, You shall hear no Lions roar. When winter forces you to yield, No Stags shall graze upon the field....
body:
When winter comes for war,
You shall hear no Lions roar.
When winter forces you to yield,
No Stags shall graze upon the field.
When winter creeps upon you from the shadows,
No Roses shall bloom from the meadows.
When winter wreaks havoc on the land,
You can bet there’ll be no Snakes in the sand.
When winter brings to life all it finds grim,
The Krakens will freeze where they swim.
When winter sets and the land begins to shiver,
The Flayed Man will start to rot and wither.
When winter fights to the last sliver,
No more Trouts shall swim in the river.
When winter ravages and all despair,
No Falcons shall fly high in the air.
When winter shows you what happens when snow falls,
Not even Dragons Breath shall warm you in your halls.
When winter comes with all it’s might,
Only the Wolves shall howl in the night!﻿

x

When winter comes for war,
You shall hear no Lions roar.
When winter forces you to yield,
No Stags shall graze upon the field.
When winter creeps upon you from the shadows,
No Roses shall bloom from the meadows.
When winter wreaks havoc on the land,
You can bet there’ll be no Snakes in the sand.
When winter brings to life all it finds grim,
The Krakens will freeze where they swim.
When winter sets and the land begins to shiver,
The Flayed Man will start to rot and wither.
When winter fights to the last sliver,
No more Trouts shall swim in the river.
When winter ravages and all despair,
No Falcons shall fly high in the air.
When winter shows you what happens when snow falls,
Not even Dragons Breath shall warm you in your halls.
When winter comes with all it’s might,
Only the Wolves shall howl in the night!﻿

x

summary: As much as I know Sansa is gonna be annoyed with Jon when he returns from bending the knee I just want her to force him to shut...
body: As much as I know Sansa is gonna be annoyed with Jon when he returns from bending the knee I just want her to force him to shut up and play scattergories cause he’s missed months of stark family game night and her and Arya are tired of losing to Bran cause he keeps cheating with his all knowingness.
